Lunarpine transformed back to his robot mode, he placed his arm around Ice's
back and put her arm over his shoulder. She'd lost alot of blood but she was
still slightly conscious. He opened a comm to Razor Claw, "Where are you you
blasted raptor?" He put her weight on him and helped her to her feet, "Let
me help you Wing." His mind was on the last time she'd taken such damage.
Only difference was that this time he was there to make sure nothing more
happened to her.

Razor Claw heard the transmission from his viewpoint in the distance. "I've
been monitoring your situation from here, do you need assistance?" He asked
starting toward the CF at a steady pace.

Lunarpine was having trouble carrying Ice, she'd put on some weight since
becoming a polar bear. "Icebird took some damage, I could use a hand." The
wolfbot saw everyone else enter the CF,  it was nice to see that they were
still so compassionate.

In a matter of seconds the wolverine crossed the distance. he put on the
breaks sliding across the dirt leaving a trail of dust and ash behind him.
He quickly transformed to his "robot mode" and extended his short raptorlike
arms. "Let me help" he stated putting his arms in a supportive position to
help carry the polarbot.

Once inside the two bots moved Ice to a CR chamber for repairs.


----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, March 24, 2001 10:52 PM
Subject: Ice


> Ice::
>
> She stumbled and fell to the ground. Her energy was gone and she
> needed a recharge in the worst way.  She was still leaking from her
> shoulder and felt really light headed. In a few minutes, she go into
> stasis lock.
